20110126185529.000|20110126185529.000|CC1|       VESIcare mayause         
20110126185529.000|20110126185530.000|CC1|       allergic reactions       
20110126185530.000|20110126185532.000|CC1|      that may be serious.      
20110126185532.000|20110126185532.000|CC1|   If you experience swelling   
20110126185532.000|20110126185534.000|CC1|       of the face, lips,       
20110126185534.000|20110126185534.000|CC1|  throat or tongue, stop taking 
20110126185534.000|20110126185537.000|CC1|VESIcare and get emergency help.
20110126185537.000|20110126185538.000|CC1|   Tell your doctor right away  
20110126185538.000|20110126185538.000|CC1|       if you have severe       
20110126185538.000|20110126185540.000|CC1|         abdominal pain         
20110126185540.000|20110126185540.000|CC1|      or become constipated     
20110126185540.000|20110126185542.000|CC1|     for threor more days.

20110126185542.000|20110126185544.000|CC1|         blurred vision,        
20110126185544.000|20110126185544.000|CC1|  so use caution while driving  
20110126185544.000|20110126185547.000|CC1|     or doing unsafe tasks.
